mapper.insert: insert into ht_base_drug (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGNAME, DRUGCODE, DRUGTYPE, SPEC, UNIT, STORAGEUNIT, STORAGEQUANTITY, DISPENSEUNIT, DISPENSEQUANTITY, ORIGIN, DOSAGEFORMS, DOSAGE, DOSAGEUNIT, COMMONNAME, APPROVALNO, USEBYFRONT, USEBYBACKEND, PRICE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storagequantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispenseunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispensequantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageforms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usebyfront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usebybackend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ht_base_drug set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGNAME = #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGCODE = #{drugcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGTYPE = #{drugtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEUNIT = #{storageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEQUANTITY = #{storagequantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPENSEUNIT = #{dispenseunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPENSEQUANTITY = #{dispensequantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGEFORMS = #{dosageforms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGE = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGEUNIT = #{dosageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMONNAME = #{commonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVALNO = #{approvalno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEBYFRONT = #{usebyfront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEBYBACKEND = #{usebybackend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGNAME, DRUGCODE, DRUGTYPE, SPEC, UNIT, STORAGEUNIT, STORAGEQUANTITY, DISPENSEUNIT, DISPENSEQUANTITY, ORIGIN, DOSAGEFORMS, DOSAGE, DOSAGEUNIT, COMMONNAME, APPROVALNO, USEBYFRONT, USEBYBACKEND, PRICE from ht_base_drug where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGNAME, DRUGCODE, DRUGTYPE, SPEC, UNIT, STORAGEUNIT, STORAGEQUANTITY, DISPENSEUNIT, DISPENSEQUANTITY, ORIGIN, DOSAGEFORMS, DOSAGE, DOSAGEUNIT, COMMONNAME, APPROVALNO, USEBYFRONT, USEBYBACKEND, PRICE from ht_base_drug
